title: Receive cyber security case studies from SSE, DECC, National Grid and British Gas | Oil and Gas Cyber Security
text: Distribution channels: Conferences & Trade Fairs , Energy ... Receive cyber security case studies from SSE, DECC, National Grid and British Gas | Oil and Gas Cyber Security Oil and Gas Cyber Security 2015 will feature case studies & project updates delivered by organisations including SSE, DECC, National Grid, British Gas and more. LONDON, ENGLAND, UNITED KINGDOM, October 5,   SMi's 5th annual Oil and Gas Cyber Security conference, taking place on 30th November - 1st December 2015 in London, will evaluate current cyber security measures with keynote presentations and case studies from SSE, DECC, National Grid, British Gas and more. The two-day programme will build on the success of the 2014 event and discuss recent efforts to bolster protection of highly valuable intellectual property and commercially sensitive information . Managing security of networks and wireless communication systems, as well as defending IT infrastructure from external virus attacks and internal compatibility threats is a top priority. Key case studies at SMi's 5th annual Oil and Gas Cyber Security conference include: • How the UK energy networks are organising to face the increasing threat to supply Ewen MacDonald, Head of Information Risk and Security, SSE • DECC and Energy Sector Cyber Security Deborah Petterson, Head of Energy Cyber Security, DECC • Challenges of Cyber Security in the Critical National Infrastructure Graham Wright, CISO & Global Head of Digital Risk and Security, National Grid • The Digitalisation of the Oil & Gas Sector – Internet of Things Chris Patten, Enterprise Architect, Technologist, British Gas To view the full speaker line-up and two-day conference programme, visit http://www.oilandgas-cybersecurity.co.uk/einpresswire Vinh Trinh
